title: Daily Quest Missing?
body: Hey, I'm leveling a new account and @lvl 12 right now but I haven't received the daily win quest. Is there a certain lvl you get access to the daily win quest?

replies.body: Nothing to see here, just here to **confirm** ^_^

Howdy Drought Boy 69,

The The First Win Of The Day (FWotD) mission will become available at level 15!
[_Source_](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ORnEVuEQ-common-tech-issues)

Sincerely
-Bladenite
